text: The Definitive Alice Cooper is a 2001 compilation album by Alice Cooper. It is the international counterpart to his US only Mascara and Monsters: The Best of Alice Cooper with a different album cover and slightly different songlist. It went to number 60 in Australia and number 33 in the United Kingdom. ==Track listing== ==References== Category:2001 albums Category:Alice Cooper albums
title: The Definitive Alice Cooper
